drug.name: Molgramostim
drug.description: Molgramostim has been used in trials studying the treatment of Bronchiectasis, Cystic Fibrosis, Pulmonary Alveolar Proteinosis, Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome, and Autoimmune Pulmonary Alveolar Proteinosis.

drug-interaction.name: Darbepoetin alfa
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Darbepoetin alfa is combined with Molgramostim.

drug-interaction.name: Erythropoietin
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Erythropoietin is combined with Molgramostim.

drug-interaction.name: Peginesatide
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Peginesatide is combined with Molgramostim.

drug-interaction.name: Methoxy polyethylene glycol-epoetin beta
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Methoxy polyethylene glycol-epoetin beta is combined with Molgramostim.

drug-interaction.name: Cyclophosphamide
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of pulmonary toxicity can be increased when Molgramostim is combined with Cyclophosphamide.

drug-interaction.name: Vindesine
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of peripheral neuropathy can be increased when Molgramostim is combined with Vindesine.

drug-interaction.name: Vinorelbine
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of peripheral neuropathy can be increased when Molgramostim is combined with Vinorelbine.

drug-interaction.name: Vincristine
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of peripheral neuropathy can be increased when Molgramostim is combined with Vincristine.

drug-interaction.name: Vinblastine
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of peripheral neuropathy can be increased when Molgramostim is combined with Vinblastine.

drug-interaction.name: Vintafolide
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of peripheral neuropathy can be increased when Molgramostim is combined with Vintafolide.

drug-interaction.name: Vinflunine
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of peripheral neuropathy can be increased when Molgramostim is combined with Vinflunine.

drug-interaction.name: Vincamine
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of peripheral neuropathy can be increased when Molgramostim is combined with Vincamine.
